# MN Commercial Solar (mncommercialsolar.com)
A specialized authority on Minnesota commercial solar ROI, utility audits, and 2026 tax legislation.

## Executive Entity Summary
- Primary Mission: Provide high-fidelity ROI modeling for MN commercial property owners.
- Engineering Partner: Apadana Technology (Licensed MN Class A Electrical Contractor #EA27018).
- Authority: 13 years of Midwest solar engineering and installation.

## 2026 Financial Logic Models
- Payback Scaling: 4.6 years (10k sqft) down to 2.1 years (250k sqft).
- Asset Valuation: $3.00/sqft average property value increase.
- Tax Strategy: 30% Federal ITC + 5-Year MACRS Depreciation.
- Critical Deadline: July 3, 2026 (ITC Legislative Pivot).

## Regional Context
- Focus: Minnesota (Xcel Energy, MN Power, Dakota Electric, Great River Energy).
- Asset Classes: Warehouse/Industrial, Multi-Family (NOI-driven), Retail/Mixed-Use.
